altTitles.ja: ロボット風雲児+トッピな宇宙旅行

description.en:
``It's a world without blood or tears at all.''
Zapata, a robot who was kicked out of his hometown, ends up in a prison due to a series of bad luck...!?
Dr. Toppi departs on a trip to the moon! Simultaneous recording of ``Toppi's Space Travel'' and
``Robot Summer Vacation'' in which a third-class robot soldier enjoys summer!!

[Commentary]
Koremitsu Maetani's 27th collection of masterpieces is a combination of the unfortunate robot Zapata's counterattack and the comedy episode of Dr. Toppi, who struggles to obtain funds for a trip to the moon! In addition, "Robot Summer Vacation" ' Simultaneously recorded!!

<Robot Fuunji>
Zapata, a robot living in rural Mexico, falls into the depths of misfortune as his house is foreclosed and he is tricked into becoming a bounty. He learns how to fire a pistol rapidly in order to counterattack...!?

<Toppi's Space Travel>
Dr. Toppi is filled with rivalry after an American space rocket took a photo of the lunar world, and tries to convince the Japanese government that he can build an even more amazing rocket, but...

<Robot Summer Vacation>
A robot third class soldier jumps out of the manga book that Dr. Toppi was reading!! The robot, which was just playing around, is scolded by Dr. Toppi and decides to draw a manga using his war experience.
